name: Stilts
description: After this theme from hell for Ludum Dare 44, this is all I could come up with after spending more than a third of the jam brainstorming. This did not end up well. You are supposed to be a person who is obsessed with materialism and trends, who can either be with his family, or gaining stuff, (hats and stilts), while completely neglecting his family. His life is all about money, His life is money. (theme). The stilts were originally supposed to represent how going down the path of trying to make yourself higher than everyone else will only make you fall harder later, but I didn't have the time to do that, so this exists.
